0.1.3.name: node-sass-magic-importer
0.1.3.description: Custom node-sass importer for selector specific imports, module importing, globbing support, import files only once and importing of files with .css extension

scripts.scripts:bundle: rollup --config --format cjs --output dist/index.js js/index.js

1.0.0.name: node-sass-magic-importer
1.0.0.description: Custom node-sass importer for selector specific imports, module importing, globbing support, import files only once and importing of files with .css extension

scripts.scripts:bundle: rollup --config --format cjs --output dist/index.js js/index.js && rollup --config --format cjs --output dist/MagicImporter.js js/lib/MagicImporter.js

4.0.0.name: node-sass-magic-importer
4.0.0.description: Custom node-sass importer for selector specific imports, node importing, module importing, globbing support and importing files only once

scripts.scripts:bundle: rm -R dist && rollup --config --format cjs --output dist/cli.js js/cli.js && rollup --config --format cjs --output dist/index.js js/index.js && rollup --config --format cjs --output dist/lib/default-options.js js/lib/default-options.js && rollup --config --format cjs --output dist/lib/magic-importer.js js/lib/magic-importer.js
scripts.scripts: npm run scripts:bundle && npm run scripts:lint-no-error
scripts.test:cli: npm run scripts:bundle && mocha test/cli.test.js --compilers js:babel-core/register
scripts.test: npm run scripts:bundle && mocha test/* --compilers js:babel-core/register
